physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Tumors on right mons pubis, bilateral thighs, and left arm. No abnormal T-cell population in peripheral blood flow cytometry (July 2002). Biopsy showed large transformed cells with dysplastic nuclei.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Symptomatic recurrence of tumor along the left upper medial thigh after initial treatment.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Tumors on right arm and leg of husband; skin biopsy showed large irregular lymphocytes consistent with large T-cell lymphoma.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The husband had a 15-year history of presumed psoriasis before diagnosis. His treatment showed minimal improvement over several months.
